cvHeader.title: Full Stack Developer
cvHeader.shortDescription: Passionate full stack developer with experience building modern web applications using JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, React, and Node.js. Dedicated to writing clean, efficient code and continuously learning new technologies.

education.name: Bachelor's in Electronics-ICT - Major ICT
education.universityName: Thomas More University of Applied Sciences
description: Graduated with a final average of 76.50%.
Honors: Received the Willy Asselman award for the best bachelor thesis of Electronics-ICT.

responsibilities: Developed a real-time support chat platform with React & Next.js for the frontend, and C# .NET for the backend, hosted on Azure.
Integrated Azure Communication Services to enable duplex messaging and multi-agent support.
Collaborated in Agile teams, improving sprint delivery efficiency.

otherExperience: Worked in customer-facing student jobs at Brico, Walibi, Delhaize, and Oxfam.
Developed strong teamwork and collaboration skills.
Improved communication and customer service abilities.

projects.description: Developed a real-time chat platform connecting users with support agents, featuring secure duplex messaging, WebSocket-based updates, multi-agent management, and seamless integration with third-party websites.
projects.technologies: React, Next.js, TypeScript, C# .NET, Azure Communication Services

projects.description: Developed a note-taking application as a school project similar to Microsoft's OneNote app, with Angular and Firebase. It features user authentication, real-time data synchronization, and CRUD operations for notes.
